name: TSVG
description: Preview SVG inside TypeScript/JavaScript template literals. Mark a template with /*svg*/ before the backtick to get a gutter icon and code lens; open a live preview in a side tab. Supports variablesâ€”inputs are provided for each ${...} with sensible defaults inferred from attribute names (e.g. width, fill, color).

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.cjs
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.cjs --production
scripts.publish:all: sh -c ". ./.env && npx @vscode/vsce package && npx @vscode/vsce publish -p \"$ACCESS_TOKEN_VSC\" && npx ovsx publish -p \"$ACCESS_TOKEN_OPEN_VSX\""
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
